description:
Whether you're on a consumer product (like Gmail, Search, Maps, Chrome, Android) or a business product (Google Ads, AdSense, Google Marketing Platform, Analytics), you take part in a complete marketing experience as you lead every facet of the product's journey. From determining positioning, naming, competitive analysis, feature prioritization and external communications, you help shape the voice of the product and help it grow a consumer base. This means you work with a cross-functional team across Sales, corporate communications, legal, webmasters, product development, engineering and more. In this role, you'll be involved with product marketing strategy from beginning to end.

The Hardware (HW) Marketing Social team is focused on establishing Google as the most desired and loved hardware brand. We’re looking for a Social Marketing Lead to build brand love through our social strategy and lead the charge to take social beyond just the feed and integrate social across multiple customer touch-points.

In this role, you will be responsible for both strategy and operations. As a strategist, you’ll be expected to lead and define our global cross hardware social strategy for Made by Google to support our HW brand and HW products (i.e., Pixel, Create). You’ll be responsible for executing this vision and measuring the impact by working closely with cross-functional partners, including our Social Creative Agency Partner, Product and Consumer Marketing teams, and Social Support and Operations teams.

Know the user. Know the magic. Connect the two. At its core, marketing at Google starts with technology and ends with the user, bringing both together in unconventional ways. Our job is to demonstrate how Google's products solve the world's problems--from the everyday to the epic, from the mundane to the monumental. And we approach marketing in a way that only Google can--changing the game, redefining the medium, making the user the priority, and ultimately, letting the technology speak for itself.

qualifications:
Minimum qualifications:

  • Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience.
  • 10 years of marketing experience with social leadership experience for a large consumer brand or agency.
  • Experience working in a matrixed organization, agency, and with internal teams.

Preferred qualifications:

  • Experience in brand strategy.
  • Experience in writing and communications.
  • Understanding of Google products.
  • Understanding of social media metrics and ability to translate them into actionable insights.
  • Passion for social media and marketing.
responsibilities:
• Define the social strategy and plan for Made by Google social channels and oversee day-to-day channel operations for @madebygoogle and @googlepixel across four platforms.
  • Develop the global vision and overarching social strategy for our hardware brand and products (@madebygoogle & @googlepixel).
  • Partner and collaborate cross-functionally with Product Marketing teams (i.e., Nest, Google Pixel, Google Home), Google social stakeholders, community management, and social operations teams to develop a coordinated and holistic approach.
  • Be a thought leader and take social beyond the feed and integrate social into all consumer touch points.
  • Drive innovation that creates breakthrough conversations about our brand and products. Advocate best practices using insights and cross-functional learnings. Institutionalize best practices and learnings using insights and cross-functional learnings.
title: Social Marketing Lead, Hardware Marketing
